Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: As turmeric and lime when mixed produce red colour, but when betel leaf, lime, betelnut and catechu are all brought together, a very deep red colour is produced;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: hldI Aqy cUnw iml ky Arun brn jYsy ijs qrHwˆ lwl rMg bx jwˆdw hY qy cqur brn kY qMbol rs rUp hY pwn dy p`qy dw hirAw rMg +k`Qy dw qy supwrI dw imitAwlw lwlI Bw mwrx vwlw, Aru cUny klI dw ic`tw eynwˆ cOhwˆ rMgwˆ dy myl qoˆ qMbol pwn rs rUp lwl gulwl rMg vwlw ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: dUD mY jwvnu imlY diD kY bKwnIAq; KwNf iGRq cUn imil ibMjn AnUp hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: As a small cogulent added to the milk set it as curd but sugar, flour and clarified butter produces a very tasty dish;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: dUD mY jwmn imlY du`D ivc jwg dy iml igAwˆ diD kY bKwnIAq dhIˆ dhOx lg pYˆdI hY, Aru KMf iGau qy cUn Awtw mYdw iml ky ibMjn AnUp hY suMdr sÍwdIk aupmw qoˆ rihq ibMjn Bojn dw pdwrQ kVwh pRSwd ilpsI Awid bx jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kusm sugMD imil iql sY Pulyl hoq; skl sugMD imil Argjw DUp hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: An extract of flowers when mixed with sesame oil become scented oil, but mixing of saffron musk, sandalwood and rose make a very fragrant product called argaja;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kusm sugMSiD imil iql sY iqlwˆ nwl iml ky kusm sugMiD Pu`lwˆ dI bwsnw jIkUM Pulyl hoq Pul bx jwXw krdI hY[ Aqy iesy qrHwˆ skl sugMiD imil swrIAwˆ sugMDIAwˆ dy iek`iTAwˆ ho jwx qy ijs qrHwˆ Argjw DUp hY AbIr vw lKlKw Awid nwm nwl khI jwx vwlI sugMDI smudwX rUp vsqU dw DUp pRkwS pRgt ho AOˆdw vw DUp hI qÎwr huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: doie isK swDsMgu pMc prmysr hY; ds bIs qIs imly Aibgiq aUp hY [122[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: So would two Sikhs together make a holy congregation while five of them would represent the Lord. But where ten, twenty or thirty like-minded Sikhs engrossed in the love of the Guru meet, their praise is beyond description. (122)
